name: It's not easy being me
description:
If you think your body has it easy trying to keep you alive, then why don't you try doing it yourself! In "It's not easy being me" you use your life, the blood in your veins and the air in your lungs, to keep your body alive and kicking. As organs grow you'll struggle to keep up.

Good luck!

Instructions:
- Your heart pumps blood around your body.
- Your lungs fill blood that passes through them with oxygen
- You must supply organs with a constant supply of oxygenated blood or you'll die.
- Hold the left mouse to mark new veins for creation
- Veins will be made when blood arrives at the site
- Hold right mouse to delete existing veins

Gifs:

https://imgur.com/a/sMzJRUe

Changes:

04/29/2019 - Fixed bug where, due to pressure floating point truncation, blood would stack in veins.
